TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpacityConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，用于将不透明度值转换为字符串，或将字符串转换不透明度值。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert opacity values to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，您不会直接创建的实例 。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 相反，调用类的 方法 。Instead, you call the method of class. 有关类型转换器和查看代码示例的详细信息，请参阅 基类和 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters and to view code examples, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法专用于将 表示百分比或小数部分的值转换为其对应的 值，这些值将不透明度表示为百分比。The method is specialized to convert values that represent percentages or decimal fractions to their corresponding values, which represent the opacity as a percentage. 以外的类型 将传递给此方法的基类实现。Types other than are passed to the base class implementation of this method.

exception.span: 该对象不是转换所支持的类型。

span.span: The object was not a supported type for the conversion.

exception.span: 未能正确地转换为类型 。

span.span: could not be properly converted to type .
-or-

exception.span: 得到的转换后的 小于百分之零或大于百分之百。

span.span: The resulting converted was less than zero percent or greater than one hundred percent.
